data.eml:eml: New species of Isometopinae (Hemiptera: Miridae) from Yemen with a new name for Isometopus longirostris Akingbohungbe from Sudan

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Akingbohungbe, A. E. (2006): New species of Isometopinae (Hemiptera: Miridae) from Yemen with a new name for Isometopus longirostris Akingbohungbe from Sudan. Zootaxa 1210: 27-38, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.273415
